title: Cask predecessor liquid taxonomy
description: Reference list of previous cask contents (predecessor liquids) used in Scotch whisky maturation.

id.description: Stable identifier for the predecessor entry (e.g. predecessor.bourbon).

aliases.description: Optional list of alternative labels and common input variants that should map to this predecessor.

lifecycle.description: Catalogue status of this predecessor entry.

category.description: High-level category (e.g. whiskey, sherry, wine, fortified-wine, rum, brandy, spirit, beer, none).

origin_country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code where the predecessor liquid originates (e.g. US, ES, PT). May be empty for category 'none'.
